alert.note: Alert for Eastern Juab, Millard Counties; Sanpete Valley (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 23 at 3:30PM MDT until March 24 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM TO 6 PM MDT FRIDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 4 inches. Winds gusting to 40 mph near and behind the cold front for 1 to 3 hours. * WHERE...Eastern Juab/Millard Counties and Sanpete Valley. * WHEN...From 6 AM to 6 PM MDT Friday. * IMPACTS...Winter driving conditions are possible, particularly in areas receiving heavy snow.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Juab, Millard Counties; Sanpete Valley
